description: This is the base class for all font resource dictionaries. Instances can be obtained via the `from` method, or by subclassing. All members of a `FontResources` (or subclass) instance will be of the type `Font`.

links.title: Defining raw font resource data in a separate JSON file.
Converting raw font resource data to `FontResources` instance.

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: A plain object or another `FontResources` instance containing values to inherit by the new `FontResources` dictionary.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The raw data (plain object) to create the dictionary from. The format must match the [Tabris.js fonts JSON schema](https://github.com/eclipsesource/tabris-js/blob/v${moduleversion}/schema/fonts.json).

from.description:
Creates a fonts dictionary from the given raw "data" object. All fonts from the given "base" dictionary are inherited unless overwritten.

Entries in the "data" object starting with "$" are considered configuration options and will not become entries in the final fonts dictionary.

parameters.name: data

The format must match the [Tabris.js fonts JSON schema](https://github.com/eclipsesource/tabris-js/blob/v${moduleversion}/schema/fonts.json). Entries in the "data" object starting with "$" are considered configuration options and will not become entries in the final fonts dictionary.
